title: Avengers and the Infinity Gauntlet 1-4 (2010) (Minutemen-MrPink&
description:
English | CBR | 4 Issues

Avengers & the Infinity Gauntlet #1-4
Publisher:  Marvel
Publication Date:  August 18, 2010 - November 24, 2010

Writers:  Brian Clevinger and Lee Black
Penciler:  Brian Churilla
Inkers:  Brian Churilla (#1 and 4), Terry Pallot (#2-4), and Sandy Florea (#4)
Colorist:  Michelle Madsen
Letterers:  Jeff Powell (#1-3) and Clayton Cowles (#4)

The evil Thanos has acquired the Infinity Gems, granting him control over the entire universe. He's destroyed half the population of all worlds. The only force standing in his way? The Avengers!

But how can a ragtag group of heroes and villains (!) overpower the unstoppable? Check out the non-stop, pulse-pounding, white-knuckling action brought to you by Brian Clevinger (Atomic Robo) and Brian Churilla (Rex Mundi, The Anchor)!

Thanks goes to MrPink and Saxon for this release.
